CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Our results demonstrated that the synergetic effect of alkyl side chain modification and processing temperature modulation to control aggregation provides practical and powerful tools to optimize the absorption broadening and optoelectronic properties of an active layer in a BHJ PSC , thus enhancing its ultimate performance .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Alkyl side chain modification |
| Processing temperature modulation |
| BHJ PSC |

Note: BHJ stands for bulk heterojunction, which is a type of organic photovoltaic cell.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Alkyl side chain modification |
| BHJ PSC |

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "processing temperature modulation" - This entity refers to a parameter that affects the processing of the material, rather than the material itself.
* "active layer" - This entity is a component of a BHJ PSC, but it is not a material name.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
